backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend source files and utilities.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Guide explaining how to deploy the application to the Internet Computer mainnet with prerequisites and steps.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining color variables, themes, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document loading the app entry script and Google AdSense.
frontend/public/ads.txt: Ads.txt file declaring the authorized Google AdSense publisher ID.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing client-side navigation and rendering tool pages.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, back navigation, ad banners, and footer around pages.
frontend/src/components/ImagePreview.tsx: Component showing original and resized image previews with dimensions.
frontend/src/components/QrPreview.tsx: Canvas-based QR code renderer that draws a matrix onto a scaled canvas.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and caching an IC actor, updating on identity changes and invalidating queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login flow and stored identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports a placeholder hook returning an empty object for future frontend-only queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes with amber‑toned color palettes.
frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts: Utility for copying text to clipboard with success and error toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/image.ts: Resizes an image by drawing it to a canvas and returning a blob URL of the resized output.
frontend/src/lib/names.ts: Generates random first, last, or full names from predefined lists, avoiding duplicates.
frontend/src/lib/numberTools.ts: Collection of numeric utilities including percentages, tips, bill splitting, age calculations, date differences, and time parsing/formatting.
frontend/src/lib/password.ts: Generates secure random passwords based on selected character sets and shuffles required characters.
frontend/src/lib/qr.ts: Produces a simple QR‑like boolean matrix with basic finder and timing patterns plus text‑based pseudo‑encoding.
frontend/src/lib/textTools.ts: Offers text utilities for case conversion, stats, line operations, slug generation, formatting, and lorem ipsum creation.
frontend/src/lib/units.ts: Defines unit categories with conversion functions for length, weight, temperature, and volume.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/HubPage.tsx: Renders a navigation hub displaying cards linking to tool categories.
frontend/src/pages/ImageResizerPage.tsx: Implements image upload, resizing with optional aspect lock, preview, and download.
frontend/src/pages/NumberConversionTools: Provides calculators for percentages, tips, dates, durations, units, bases, currency, and random numbers.
frontend/src/pages/PasswordPage.tsx: Generates customizable passwords and supports copying them to the clipboard.
frontend/src/pages/PopularToolsPage.tsx: Combines popular tools including QR codes, passwords, image resizing, unit conversion, and name generation.
frontend/src/pages/QrCodePage.tsx: Renders a QR code generator with text input, live QR preview, error handling, and a canvas-based PNG download function.
frontend/src/pages/RandomNamePage.tsx: Provides configurable random name generation with count/style options, individual and bulk copy-to-clipboard actions, and toast feedback.
Hosts multiple text utilities including case conversion, counting, sorting, slugifying, lorem ipsum generation, and hashtag creation within tabbed sections.
frontend/src/pages/UnitConverterPage.tsx: Implements a unit conversion interface that lets users select categories and units, input a value, and view auto-updating converted results.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radii, animations, plugins, and container settings for consistent theming.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, features, issues, and architectural notes for the micro tools hub.
